column2: the absolute star of the show was the smoked brisket - a juicy
column3: fork-tender affair that tasted so delicious
column4: it felt sinful to eat. Coming from a self-avowed "pulled pork" guy
column5: this conclusion came bitterly at first but Smoque BBQ earned it. The brisket was bafflingly tender and exploded with flavor the moment I sunk my teeth into it. Even without sauce
column6: Smoque's brisket outshines every barbecue restaurant I have previously been; however
column7: add a touch of their Carolina inspired sauce
column8: and we officially reach culinary nirvana.
